headline.main: Canada: No Plans to Clamp Down at Border to Deter Migrants
headline.print_headline: Canada: No Plans to Clamp Down at Border to Deter Migrants

lead_paragraph: Canada will not tighten its border to deter migrants crossing illegally from the United States in the wake of a U.S. immigration crackdown because the numbers are not big enough to cause alarm, a government minister said on Saturday.
snippet: Canada will not tighten its border to deter migrants crossing illegally from the United States in the wake of a U.S. immigration crackdown because the numbers are not big enough to cause alarm, a government minister said on Saturday....
